scripts.install: if [ -d './Server' ]; then cd Server && npm i; cd ..; fi && cd Client && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix Client" "npm run dev --prefix Server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix Server && npm run build --prefix Client
scripts.migrate:reset: NODE_ENV=production npx --prefix Server sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=production npx --prefix Server sequelize-cli db:migrate
